top_note:
PRE-MITIGATION CONTENT REMOVAL ONLY
- This estimate is strictly for the packaging and temporary relocation of contents to allow for mitigation/restoration work to begin.
- Contents temporarily relocated for mitigation/restoration access
- All items will remain on-site in a designated staging area within the basement as requested.
bottom_note:
NO UNPACKING OR RESET SERVICES INCLUDED
- This scope does NOT include moving contents back to their original location, unpacking, or any form of content re-organization post-mitigation.
- Post-restoration content return requires separate estimate.
- A new, separate estimate must be generated for any services required after the restoration work is complete.

items.name: Individual Document Wrapping - Small Items
items.dec: Important documents requiring individual plastic protection per client specification

items.name: Individual Document Wrapping - Large Items
items.dec: Large format documents and files with special handling requirements

items.name: Bookshelf and Shelving Unit Protection
items.dec: Document room furniture cloth covering and protective wrapping

items.name: Document Storage Container Preparation
items.dec: Organized document boxes with labeling system for temporary staging

items.name: Multi-Day Basement Content Manipulation
items.dec: 3-person crew - basement to same floor relocation over 3-day period

items.name: Stair Carry Fee - Document Boxes
items.dec: Individual document containers requiring careful stair transport

items.name: Special Handling Coordination
items.dec: Daily coordination and progress management for extended project timeline

items.name: Document Organization and Staging Setup
items.dec: Temporary staging area preparation with systematic document organization

items.name: Climate Protection Setup
items.dec: Environmental protection for sensitive documents during staging period
